程序包 org.elasticsearch.common.inject.spi

类 Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.inject.spi.Message
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Element
    public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements Element
    An error message and the context in which it occurred. Messages are usually created internally by Guice and its extensions. Messages can be created explicitly in a module using addError() statements: 
         try {
       bindPropertiesFromFile();
     } catch (IOException e) {
       addError(e);
     }

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSource

        public java.lang.String getSource()
        从接口复制的说明: Element
        Returns an arbitrary object containing information about the "place" where this element was configured. Used by Guice in the production of descriptive error messages.

        Tools might specially handle types they know about; StackTraceElement is a good example. Tools should simply call toString() on the source object if the type is unfamiliar.

        指定者:
        getSource 在接口中 Element
